remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中定义的指令值`OpCodes`枚举。The instruction values are defined in the `OpCodes` enumeration. 使用创建标签，并将流中的其位置通过使用固定。Labels are created using , and their location within the stream is fixed by using . 如果使用单字节指令，则标签可以表示最多 127 个字节流的跳转。If a single-byte instruction is used, the label can represent a jump of at most 127 bytes along the stream. `opcode` 必须表示分支指令。`opcode` must represent a branch instruction. 分支是相对的指令，因为`label`在修复过程将替换到分支的正确偏移量。Because branches are relative instructions, `label` will be replaced with the correct offset to branch during the fixup process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何创建具有跳转表的动态方法。The code sample below illustrates the creation of a dynamic method with a jump table. 使用数组的生成跳转表。The jump table is built using an array of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是透明的并可以从部分受信任代码调用。This method is transparent, and can be called from partially trusted code. 如果之前已发出任何 MSIL 指令访问属性，它将返回 0 （零）。If the property is accessed before any MSIL instructions have been emitted, it returns 0 (zero). 当动态语言生成 MSIL 时，此属性可以用于将 MSIL 流中的偏移量映射到源代码行号。When MSIL is generated for dynamic languages, this property can be used to map offsets in the MSIL stream to source code line numbers. 所生成的信息可以用于引发异常时提供堆栈跟踪。The resulting information can be used to provide stack traces when exceptions are thrown.
